edu.cmu.sphinx.instrumentation

Class BeamFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.instrumentation.BeamFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResultListener, Monitor, Resetable, StateListener, Configurable, java.util.EventListener

    public class BeamFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResultListener, Resetable, StateListener, Monitor
    Monitors the absolute and relative beam sizes required to achieve the optimum recognition results and reports this data.
